text:
I dont know what algorithm is being used to create zip files, but i fear it may
be pulling too much of the source file into memory to zip exceedingly large
files; 20MB is over the limit
creator: stevel@apache.org
bodewig@apache.org
text:
It is Java's own DeflaterOutputStream that is doing this.  I don't think there is
anything we can do.  Increase your VMs heap-size (or provide a reimplementation
of DeflaterOutputStream 8-).
